Compare Health System Metrics Across Levels

Source: R/7_health_systems.R
calculate_health_system_comparison.Rd

Returns a merged dataset of health coverage and system metrics at district and admin level 1 for the latest year.

Usage

calculate_health_system_comparison(
  .data,
  sbr = 0.02,
  nmr = 0.025,
  pnmr = 0.024,
  anc1survey = 0.98,
  dpt1survey = 0.97,
  survey_year = 2019,
  twin = 0.015,
  preg_loss = 0.03
)

Arguments

.data

A data frame containing raw health system inputs including year, population, coverage, and facility indicators.

sbr

Numeric. The stillbirth rate (default: 0.02).

nmr

Numeric. The neonatal mortality rate (default: 0.025).

pnmr

Numeric. The post-neonatal mortality rate (default: 0.024).

anc1survey

Numeric. Survey-based ANC-1 coverage rate (default: 0.98).

dpt1survey

Numeric. Survey-based Penta-1 coverage rate (default: 0.97).

survey_year

Integer. The year of Penta-1 survey provided

twin

Numeric. The twin birth rate (default: 0.015).

preg_loss

Numeric. The pregnancy loss rate (default: 0.03).

Value

A data frame with admin 1 and district metrics joined side by side for comparison.

On this page
